SEARCH
Package gw.api.system

Class CCConfigParameters

java.lang.Object
gw.api.system.CCConfigParameters
public class CCConfigParameters extends Object
Used to fetch the values of configuration parameters defined in config.xml The list of parameters here is the list of all legal config parameters.

  • Field Summary

  • Field Details

    • WeightedAssignmentEnabled

      public static final BooleanParameterKey WeightedAssignmentEnabled
      Enables Assignment Load Balancing. Defaults to disabled.

    • WeightedAssignmentGlobalDefaultWeight

      public static final IntegerParameterKey WeightedAssignmentGlobalDefaultWeight
      The global default weight of all assignable entities that do not match any classifications.

    • ExposureWWLEnabled

      public static final BooleanParameterKey ExposureWWLEnabled
      Indicates whether Exposure level Weighted Work Load (WWL) is enabled. This is the scenario where you apply WWL distribution to exposures as well (besides claims), and hence individual exposures on a claim may get assigned to different users. It is usual for this to be disabled, in which case exposures just get assigned to the same user that claim was assigned to. Must be set to true if you are calling "exposure.assignUserByWorkload(..)" or exposure.assignUserByWorkloadAndAttributes(..)from within Gosu or an Assignment/PreUpdate rule. Defaults to false.

    • UseRecoveryReserves

      public static final BooleanParameterKey UseRecoveryReserves
      Whether to use the Recovery Reserve transactions in financials

    • AllowMultipleLineItems

      public static final BooleanParameterKey AllowMultipleLineItems
      Whether to allow multiple line items in a transaction

    • AllowMultiplePayments

      public static final BooleanParameterKey AllowMultiplePayments
      Whether to allow multiple payments per check

    • EnableMulticurrencyReserving

      public static final BooleanParameterKey EnableMulticurrencyReserving
      Whether to enable Multi Currency Reserving (MCR) support. Note that this parameter is *not* intended to be used by non-Gosu classes and also should not be accessed directly - you should use CCConfigUtil.EnableMulticurrencyReserving instead.

    • EnableClaimSnapshot

      public static final BooleanParameterKey EnableClaimSnapshot
      Whether to create snapshots for imported and created claims

    • EnableStatCoding

      public static final BooleanParameterKey EnableStatCoding
      Whether to enable statistical coding support

    • MaxStatCodesInDropdown

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxStatCodesInDropdown
      Cap on number of stat codes to show in stat code picker dropdown

    • MaxCachedClaimSnapshots

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxCachedClaimSnapshots
      Limits the number of claim snapshots that can be cached in memory

    • SnapshotEncryptionUpgradeChunkSize

      public static final IntegerParameterKey SnapshotEncryptionUpgradeChunkSize
      Limits the number of snapshots that get upgraded (encryption change) per batch processing cycle

    • EnableClaimNumberGeneration

      public static final BooleanParameterKey EnableClaimNumberGeneration
      Whether to enable automatic claim number generation (via the adapter)

    • SeparateIdleClaimExceptionMonitor

      public static final BooleanParameterKey SeparateIdleClaimExceptionMonitor
      If true, run exception monitoring rules for idle cases at a separate time

    • IdleClaimThresholdDays

      public static final IntegerParameterKey IdleClaimThresholdDays
      Claims that haven't been touched for this number of days (including edits or exception checks) are scheduled again for exception detection

    • IdleClosedClaimThresholdDays

      public static final IntegerParameterKey IdleClosedClaimThresholdDays
      Closed claims that haven't been touched for this number of days (including edits or exception checks) are scheduled again for exception detection

    • AllowTransactionDenyWhenSubmitted

      public static final BooleanParameterKey AllowTransactionDenyWhenSubmitted

    • AllowPaymentsExceedReservesLimits

      public static final BooleanParameterKey AllowPaymentsExceedReservesLimits
      If true, users can submit payments that exceed available reserves up to the amount limited by the PaymentsExceedReserves authority limtis. Otherwise, no partial or final payments that exceed reserves are allowed

    • FinancialsOverrides

      public static final StringParameterKey FinancialsOverrides
      Contains keywords to override certain Financials verifications, for emergency backwards compatibility. Such as allowing to save transactions in draft status.

    • ForceFinancialsCalculationGetAmountMethodsNotReturnNull

      public static final BooleanParameterKey ForceFinancialsCalculationGetAmountMethodsNotReturnNull
      Call noNulls() in getAmount() enhancement methods on Financials Calculations, for backwards compatibility

    • SetReservesByTotalIncurred

      public static final BooleanParameterKey SetReservesByTotalIncurred
      Configure the Reserves UI to allow the user to modify Reserves by setting Total Incurred (true), or by setting Available Reserves (false)

    • CheckAuthorityLimits

      public static final BooleanParameterKey CheckAuthorityLimits
      Controls whether authority limits are checked for individual Checks

    • ClaimSegment

      public static final StringParameterKey ClaimSegment
      The default value to set the Segment field to on a claim

    • ClaimStrategy

      public static final StringParameterKey ClaimStrategy
      The default value to set the Strategy field to on a claim

    • ExposureSegment

      public static final StringParameterKey ExposureSegment
      The default value to set the Segment field to on an exposure

    • ExposureStrategy

      public static final StringParameterKey ExposureStrategy
      The default value to set the Strategy field to on an exposure

    • BackupWithholdingTypeCode

      public static final StringParameterKey BackupWithholdingTypeCode
      The typecode (in DeductionType) that identifies backup withholding

    • StandardWithholdingRate

      public static final DoubleParameterKey StandardWithholdingRate
      The standard backup withholding rate, as defined by the IRS. The number is a percentage (e.g., 28.0 means 28.0 percent)

    • Financials

      public static final StringParameterKey Financials
      Financials version: 'view' = financials view (read-only), 'entry' = financials entry, '3' = financials sub-ledger

    • PaymentLogThreshold

      public static final IntegerParameterKey PaymentLogThreshold
      Payments above this threshold will be logged

    • MaxCatastropheClaimFinderSearchResults

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxCatastropheClaimFinderSearchResults
      Maximum number of claims found related to a single catastrophe per invocation of the Catastrophe Claim Finder batch process.

    • MaxClaimSearchResults

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxClaimSearchResults
      The max number of claim search results to display in the UI

    • MaxActivitySearchResults

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxActivitySearchResults
      The max number of activity search results to display in the UI

    • MaxCheckSearchResults

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxCheckSearchResults
      The max number of check search results to display in the UI

    • MaxRecoverySearchResults

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxRecoverySearchResults
      The max number of recoveries search results to display in the UI

    • MaxBulkInvoiceSearchResults

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxBulkInvoiceSearchResults
      The max number of bulk invoice search results to display in the UI

    • MaxContactSearchResults

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxContactSearchResults
      The max number of contact search results to display in the UI

    • MaxContactDocumentsSearchResults

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxContactDocumentsSearchResults
      The max number of contact documents search results to display in the UI

    • MaxPolicySearchResults

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxPolicySearchResults
      The max number of policy search results to display in the UI

    • MaxNoteSearchResults

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxNoteSearchResults
      The default max number of note search results to display in the UI. A value of zero means don't limit the search

    • MaxDocTemplateSearchResults

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxDocTemplateSearchResults
      The default max number of document template search results to display in the UI

    • MaxDuplicateContactSearchResults

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxDuplicateContactSearchResults
      Maximum number of results to return from a duplicate Contact search

    • HighlyLinkedContactThreshold

      public static final IntegerParameterKey HighlyLinkedContactThreshold
      Contacts that are linked via AddressBookUID to more than this number of other contacts are considered to be highly linked. If a user is viewing a highly linked contact they will be prompted before they can view the contact's related claims, activities, exposures or matters, because these views will put a heavy load on the database. If the threshold is set to zero contacts are never considered to be highly linked.

    • MaxChooseByCoverageMenuItems

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxChooseByCoverageMenuItems
      The max number of vehicles/properties displayed in the New Exposure/Choose by Coverage menu. If this limit is exceeded users will be asked to use the coverage type menu instead

    • MaxChooseByCoverageTypeMenuItems

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxChooseByCoverageTypeMenuItems
      The max number of coverage types displayed in the New Exposure/Choose by Coverage type menu. If this limit is exceeded the coverage types will be split into alphabetic sub-menus

    • MaxClaimantsInClaimListViews

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxClaimantsInClaimListViews
      Limit the number of claimants to display for a claim within a list view. Set to zero to disable limit

    • MaxTeamSummaryChartUserBars

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxTeamSummaryChartUserBars
      The maximum number of users to display in the chart on the Team Summary page Set this to 0 to remove the chart entirely. Otherwise, the chart will display statistics for the top N users, and group the others into a bar labeled "All Other Users"

    • CloseExposureAfterFinalPayment

      public static final BooleanParameterKey CloseExposureAfterFinalPayment
      If enabled, will attempt to close exposure after a relevant final payment is made

    • CloseClaimAfterFinalPayment

      public static final BooleanParameterKey CloseClaimAfterFinalPayment
      If enabled, will attempt to close claim if final payment closes last open exposure

    • RequestReopenExplanationForTypes

      public static final ListParameterKey RequestReopenExplanationForTypes
      Define the set of reopenable entities for which, when reopened, a screen should be displayed for the user to enter a reason and note

    • GroupSummaryShowUserGlobalWorkloadStats

      public static final BooleanParameterKey GroupSummaryShowUserGlobalWorkloadStats
      Whether or not to show individual user global workload stats along side normal stats in Team Summary

    • UserStatisticsWindowSize

      public static final IntegerParameterKey UserStatisticsWindowSize
      Determines the size of the time window used to calculate some of the statistics (Last week, last month, etc.)

    • AgingStatsFirstDivision

      public static final IntegerParameterKey AgingStatsFirstDivision
      The number of days to use when calculating the first claim aging bucket. The bucket will include claims between 0 and AgingStatsFirstDivision days old

    • AgingStatsSecondDivision

      public static final IntegerParameterKey AgingStatsSecondDivision
      The number of days to use when calculating the second claim aging bucket. The bucket will include claims between AgingStatsFirstDivision + 1 and AgingStatsSecondDivision days old

    • AgingStatsThirdDivision

      public static final IntegerParameterKey AgingStatsThirdDivision
      The number of days to use when calculating the fourth claim aging bucket. The bucket will include claims between AgingStatsSecondDivision + 1 and AgingStatsThirdDivision days old. In addition, the last bucket will include all claims older than AgingStatsThirdDivision days

    • CalculateLitigatedClaimAgingStats

      public static final BooleanParameterKey CalculateLitigatedClaimAgingStats
      Whether or not to display the number of litigated claims on the claim aging screens

    • CalculateBackupWithholdingDeduction

      public static final BooleanParameterKey CalculateBackupWithholdingDeduction
      Whether or not backup withholding should be calculated for applicable checks

    • ShowCurrentPolicyNumberInSelectPolicyDialog

      public static final BooleanParameterKey ShowCurrentPolicyNumberInSelectPolicyDialog
      Whether or not to populate the select policy dialog with the policy number for the claim's current policy

    • ShowNewExposureMenuForLossTypes

      public static final ListParameterKey ShowNewExposureMenuForLossTypes
      This option allows hiding the NewExposure-action-menu for specific LossTypes. Note that removing this menu item for a LossType will also hide the Exposures step in the New Claim Wizard for that LossType

    • ShowFixedExposuresInLossDetails

      public static final BooleanParameterKey ShowFixedExposuresInLossDetails
      Works with ShowNewExposureMenuForLossTypes; claims that do not have the new exposure menu have a fixed list of exposures which can be shown either via tabs on the claim loss page (if this option is true) or via separate top level page links in the claim file (if option is false)

    • ShowNewExposureChooseByCoverageTypeMenuForLossTypes

      public static final ListParameterKey ShowNewExposureChooseByCoverageTypeMenuForLossTypes
      NewExposure-action-menu can have two sub-menus. This option allows hiding the ChooseByCoverageType submenu for specific LossTypes

    • ShowNewExposureChooseByCoverageMenuForLossTypes

      public static final ListParameterKey ShowNewExposureChooseByCoverageMenuForLossTypes
      NewExposure-action-menu has two sub-menus. This option allows hiding the ChooseByCoverage submenu for specific LossTypes. Recommendation: Omit WC from this list

    • HidePolicyObjectsWithNoCoveragesForLossTypes

      public static final ListParameterKey HidePolicyObjectsWithNoCoveragesForLossTypes
      NewExposure-action-menu/ChooseByCoverage has three sub-menus. This option allows hiding empty Vehicle and Property submenus for specific LossTypes

    • UseACLPermissions

      public static final BooleanParameterKey UseACLPermissions
      Whether or not use the ACL permission model. If false, a user's privileges will apply to every claim. If true, access will be controlled by the ClaimAccess table

    • DashboardWindowPeriod

      public static final IntegerParameterKey DashboardWindowPeriod
      Determines the number of days used for executive dashboard calculations that depend on a period

    • DashboardIncurredLimit

      public static final IntegerParameterKey DashboardIncurredLimit
      The total incurred amount above which the executive dashboard will count the claim as over limit

    • DashboardShowByCoverage

      public static final BooleanParameterKey DashboardShowByCoverage
      Whether or not to display the coverage stats on the executive dashboard

    • DashboardShowByLineOrLoss

      public static final BooleanParameterKey DashboardShowByLineOrLoss
      Whether or not to display the line of business and loss type stats on the executive dashboard

    • PolicySystemArchivingEnabled

      public static final BooleanParameterKey PolicySystemArchivingEnabled
      If true, searching with archived policies will be enabled (through selecting a new policy on the claim or through the FNOL Wizard). However, these policies cannot be selected while being archived. This should only be enabled if the policy adapter can return an "archived" policy status.

    • MaintainPolicyValidationLevelOnPolicyChange

      public static final BooleanParameterKey MaintainPolicyValidationLevelOnPolicyChange
      If true, when the policy for a claim is refreshed or changed (through the Refresh/Select Policy buttons in the UI), the new policy will be validated at the level of the old policy. If false, the new policy will be validated at newloss. In either case, a validation failure will cause the policy refresh or change to be reverted

    • IgnorePolicyTotalVehiclesValue

      public static final BooleanParameterKey IgnorePolicyTotalVehiclesValue
      If true, the policy vehicles screens will suppress the message telling the user whether all of the vehicles which appear on the policy have been downloaded to the ClaimCenter policy snapshot. This should be set to true if the policy adapter is not capable of returning a meaningful value for policy.TotalVehicles, and generally set to false otherwise

    • IgnorePolicyTotalPropertiesValue

      public static final BooleanParameterKey IgnorePolicyTotalPropertiesValue
      If true, the policy properties screens will suppress the message telling the user whether all of the properties which appear on the policy have been downloaded to the ClaimCenter policy snapshot. This should be set to true if the policy adapter is not capable of returning a meaningful value for policy.TotalProperties, and generally set to false otherwise

    • ISOPropertiesFileName

      public static final StringParameterKey ISOPropertiesFileName
      The name of the ISO properties file in the ISO configuration directory

    • EnableMetroIntegration

      public static final BooleanParameterKey EnableMetroIntegration
      If true, the Metro integration is enabled from the UI and will send messages to the Metropolitan Reporting Bureau service

    • MetroReadTimeout

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MetroReadTimeout
      Read timeout for Metro Integration in milliseconds. A value of zero will make the timeout infinite

    • MetroConnectionTimeout

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MetroConnectionTimeout
      Connection timeout for Metro Integration in milliseconds. A value of zero will make the timeout infinite

    • MetroPropertiesFileName

      public static final StringParameterKey MetroPropertiesFileName
      The name of the Metro properties file in the Metro configuration directory

    • DisableIndexFastFullScanForClaimSearch

      public static final BooleanParameterKey DisableIndexFastFullScanForClaimSearch
      ClaimCenter works around some bad execution plans by disabling index fast full scan when executing certain claim searches on Oracle. This parameter controls the work around and is true by default. If a future version of Oracle fixes the defect this parameter may be removed. The parameter has no effect on databases other than Oracle

    • DisableIndexFastFullScanForRecoverySearch

      public static final BooleanParameterKey DisableIndexFastFullScanForRecoverySearch
      ClaimCenter works around some bad execution plans by disabling index fast full scan when executing certain recovery searches on Oracle. This parameter controls the work around and is true by default. If a future version of Oracle fixes the defect this parameter may be removed. The parameter has no effect on databases other than Oracle

    • DisableHashJoinForClaimSearch

      public static final BooleanParameterKey DisableHashJoinForClaimSearch
      ClaimCenter works around hash join related query plan problems when executing certain claim searches on Oracle. This parameter controls part of the work around and is true by default. The parameter has no effect on databases other than Oracle

    • DisableSortMergeJoinForClaimSearch

      public static final BooleanParameterKey DisableSortMergeJoinForClaimSearch
      ClaimCenter works around sort merge join query plan problems when executing certain claim searches on Oracle. This parameter controls part of the workaround when DisableHashJoinForClaimSearch is set to true and is true by default. The parameter has no effect on databases other than Oracle

    • SetSemiJoinNestedLoopsForClaimSearch

      public static final BooleanParameterKey SetSemiJoinNestedLoopsForClaimSearch
      ClaimCenter works around semi join query plan problems by forcing nested loop semi join instead of choose when executing certain claim searches on Oracle. This parameter controls part of the work around and is true by default. The parameter has no effect on databases other than Oracle

    • DisableIndexFastFullScanForTeamGroupActivities

      public static final BooleanParameterKey DisableIndexFastFullScanForTeamGroupActivities
      ClaimCenter works around index fast full scan related query plan problems when executing the team group activities page's main query on Oracle. This parameter controls the work around and is true by default. If a future version of Oracle fixes the defect this parameter may be removed. The parameter has no effect on databases other than Oracle.

    • DisableIndexFastFullScanForDesktopActivities

      public static final BooleanParameterKey DisableIndexFastFullScanForDesktopActivities
      ClaimCenter works around index fast full scan related query plan problems when executing the desktop activities page's main query on Oracle. This parameter controls the work around and is true by default. If a future version of Oracle fixes the defect this parameter may be removed. The parameter has no effect on databases other than Oracle.

    • DisableHashJoinForTeamGroupActivities

      public static final BooleanParameterKey DisableHashJoinForTeamGroupActivities
      ClaimCenter works around hash join related query plan problems when executing the team group activities page's main query on Oracle. This parameter controls part of the work around and is true by default. The parameter has no effect on databases other than Oracle.

    • DisableSortMergeJoinForTeamGroupActivities

      public static final BooleanParameterKey DisableSortMergeJoinForTeamGroupActivities
      ClaimCenter works around sort merge join query plan problems when executing the team group activities page's main query on Oracle. This parameter controls part of the workaround when DisableHashJoinForClaimSearch is set to true and is true by default. The parameter has no effect on databases other than Oracle.

    • QueryRewriteForClaimSearch

      public static final StringParameterKey QueryRewriteForClaimSearch
      Specify whether claim search should use materialized view query rewrite and whether the data staleness is acceptable

    • AddIndexHintForLossDate

      public static final BooleanParameterKey AddIndexHintForLossDate
      Specify whether using LossDate in the criteria should force the use of the Claim index (ID, Retired, LossDate, ClaimNumber, Flagged)

    • MaxACLParameters

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxACLParameters
      Maximum number of users and groups to directly include in search query that checks the claim access control list; beyond this limit the users and groups are stored in database tables and are checked via an additional join in the query. A value of -1 means use the appropriate default value for the current database

    • EntityValidationOrder

      public static final StringParameterKey EntityValidationOrder
      Order that validation should execute when validating multiple entities. Any entities not specified in this list will be validated after all listed entities

    • DaysClosedBeforeArchive

      public static final IntegerParameterKey DaysClosedBeforeArchive
      The number of days to add to the current date when computing the DateEligibleForArchive date for a claim being closed

    • DaysRetrievedBeforeArchive

      public static final IntegerParameterKey DaysRetrievedBeforeArchive
      The number of days to add to the current date when computing the DateEligibleForArchive date for a claim being retrieved from the archive

    • RestorePattern

      public static final StringParameterKey RestorePattern
      Key of the Activity Pattern used to create restore activities

    • AssignClaimToRetriever

      public static final BooleanParameterKey AssignClaimToRetriever
      Whether or not to assign the retrieved claim to current user

    • EnforceNonCustomAuthorityLimitProfilesCannotHaveDuplicateNames

      public static final BooleanParameterKey EnforceNonCustomAuthorityLimitProfilesCannotHaveDuplicateNames
      Enforce that non-custom Authority Limit Profiles cannot have duplicate names

    • UseDeductibleHandling

      public static final BooleanParameterKey UseDeductibleHandling
      Whether to use Deductible Handling

    • MaxClaimResultsPerClaimHealthCalcBatch

      public static final IntegerParameterKey MaxClaimResultsPerClaimHealthCalcBatch
      Maximum number of claims per invocation of the Claim Health Calculation batch process to calculate metrics and indicators.

    • ClaimHealthCalcMaxLossDateInYears

      public static final IntegerParameterKey ClaimHealthCalcMaxLossDateInYears
      Maximum number of years to find claims for in the Claim Health Calculation batch process to calculate metrics and indicators.

    • KeepCompletedMessagesForDays

      public static final IntegerParameterKey KeepCompletedMessagesForDays
      Old messages in the message history table are purged when they have been there for this number of days

    • InitialReserveAllowedPeriod

      public static final IntegerParameterKey InitialReserveAllowedPeriod
      Number of days new initial reserves contribute to the initial reserve sum of the Percent Reserve Change Claim Metric calculation after the first initial reserve is created. Initial reserves are reserves created when creating the Claim/Exposure or the first set of reserves created on the Claim/Exposure when there are no previous reserves for those entities.

    • HighRiskAssessmentCategories

      public static final StringParameterKey HighRiskAssessmentCategories
      A list of values for the Category field of AssessmentSummary that indicates the assessment is "high risk". Separate values with a semi-colon ";".

    • PolicySystemURL

      public static final StringParameterKey PolicySystemURL
      URL to use in exit points which view items in the policy system. If integrating with PolicyCenter this parameter can be set to the PolicyCenter base URL (e.g. http://server/pc) and the exit points will add the appropriate PolicyCenter entry point. If integrating with another policy system the exit points will also need to be changed to set up the parameters required by that system. If this parameter is omitted or set to the empty string the buttons in the UI that take you to the exit points will be hidden.

    • ContactSystemURL

      public static final StringParameterKey ContactSystemURL
      URL to use in exit points which view items in the contact system. If integrating with ContactManager this parameter can be set to the ContactManager base URL (e.g. http://server/ab) and the exit points will add the appropriate ContactManager entry point. If integrating with another contact system the ExitPoints will also need to be changed to set up the parameters required by that system. If this parameter is omitted or set to the empty string, the parameter will default to using the value for ab set in the suite-config.xml. If both values are null, then the buttons in the UI that take you to the exit points will be hidden.

    • ExternalLinkIDPrefix

      public static final StringParameterKey ExternalLinkIDPrefix
      The prefix for External LinkID for AddressBookLinkables when they are created without LinkID

    • HeatMapServiceTemplate

      public static final StringParameterKey HeatMapServiceTemplate
      Selects which map service to use (such as Bing Maps or Google Maps) for displaying heat maps, such as the catastrophe map. Contains the fully-qualified name of the associated Gosu template, such as "gw.api.heatmap.impl.BingMap".

    • HeatMapCredential

      public static final StringParameterKey HeatMapCredential
      Credential associated with the heat map, such as the catastrophe map, that is passed to the map service (such as Bing Maps or Google Maps) and is used in the template specified in HeatMapServiceTemplate.

    • HeatMapPolicyLocationDemo

      public static final BooleanParameterKey HeatMapPolicyLocationDemo
      Enables, for demonstrations, display of policy locations on the catastrophe and the Admin Catastrophe Detail/Policy Locations tab. Should not be set to true in production, but is harmless if it is.

    • CatastropheClaimHeatMapCacheRefreshSecs

      public static final IntegerParameterKey CatastropheClaimHeatMapCacheRefreshSecs
      Interval at which the catastrophe heat map will re-read claim information from the database into the cache, in seconds. A smaller interval will give more timely claim data but will increase the load on the database.

    • CatastrophePolicyLocationHeatMapCacheRefreshSecs

      public static final IntegerParameterKey CatastrophePolicyLocationHeatMapCacheRefreshSecs
      Interval at which the catastrophe heat map will re-read policy location information from the database into the cache, in seconds. A smaller interval will give more timely policy data but will increase the load on the database.

    • ClaimLossDateDemarcation

      public static final TimeParameterKey ClaimLossDateDemarcation
      The default time that is used for the Claim's loss date (when not specified in the FNOL).

    • PaymentRoundingMode

      public static final StringParameterKey PaymentRoundingMode
      Default rounding mode for conversion of amounts among TransactionAmount, ClaimAmount, and ReportingAmount columns on the TransactionLineItem entity for Payment transactions.

    • ReserveRoundingMode

      public static final StringParameterKey ReserveRoundingMode
      Default rounding mode for conversion of amounts among TransactionAmount, ClaimAmount, and ReportingAmount columns on the TransactionLineItem entity for Reserve transactions.

    • AllowNegativeManualChecks

      public static BooleanParameterKey AllowNegativeManualChecks
      The default behavior of the system has been to disallow manual checks from being negative. However, there is a need by some customers to allow for the creation of negative manual checks. This parameter allows manual checks to have a negative value

    • DeleteCompletedApprovalActivitiesOnEdit

      public static BooleanParameterKey DeleteCompletedApprovalActivitiesOnEdit
      When a Check or BulkInvoice is edited and resubmitted, its default behavior is to delete all old approval activities. Setting this parameter to false will preserve completed approval activities, so they continue to appear in the Approval History. Approval Activities that have not been completed (Approved or Rejected) will always be deleted upon resubmission, no matter what this setting is.

    • ServiceRequestAPIMaxSearchResults

      public static final IntegerParameterKey ServiceRequestAPIMaxSearchResults
      The maximum number of service requests returned by a search performed through the ServiceRequestAPI webservice.

    • ServiceRequestAPIMaxMessageResults

      public static final IntegerParameterKey ServiceRequestAPIMaxMessageResults
      The maximum number of service request messages returned through the ServiceRequestAPI webservice.

    • ServiceRequestAPIMaxDaysKeepActiveWithoutInvoice

      public static final IntegerParameterKey ServiceRequestAPIMaxDaysKeepActiveWithoutInvoice
      Specifies the maximum number of days that a service request will be considered active by the ServiceRequestAPI when it is work complete, but has no valid invoice(s).

    • AddressDeletionDelay

      public static final IntegerParameterKey AddressDeletionDelay
      The amount of time (in minutes) to wait before the AddressDeleteWorkQueue will delete an address marked as a potential orphan

    • IgnoreClosedClaimsDuringIncidentRemapUpgradeTrigger

      public static final BooleanParameterKey IgnoreClosedClaimsDuringIncidentRemapUpgradeTrigger
      Whether Closed Claims are considered for Exposure->Incident remapping

    • IgnoreClosedExposuresDuringIncidentRemapUpgradeTrigger

      public static final BooleanParameterKey IgnoreClosedExposuresDuringIncidentRemapUpgradeTrigger
      Whether Closed Exposures are considered for Exposure->Incident remapping

    • SuppressIncidentExposureCoverageSubtypeEnforcement

      public static final BooleanParameterKey SuppressIncidentExposureCoverageSubtypeEnforcement
      Disables the enforcement of exposure CoverageSubtype mapping to ExposureType and ExposureType to incident type. This disables the following: - The version trigger that updates ExposureType and remaps incidents, to run during upgrades. - The entity callbacks in claim and exposure for the above - The database consistency and loader integrity checks for matching exposure CoverageSubtype to ExposureType and ExposureType to incident type This could be used when exposures and incidents should not be changed because their information has already been sent downstream

    • ClaimOrExposureUnableToClosePattern

      public static final StringParameterKey ClaimOrExposureUnableToClosePattern
      The name of the activity pattern to use when a claim or an exposure cannot be closed

    • BizRulesExposureDisabledWhenIncidentOnly

      public static final BooleanParameterKey BizRulesExposureDisabledWhenIncidentOnly
      Whether exposure BizRules will be disabled if the claim is marked as "Incident only". Default is true.

    • CloningLocalContactTraversalStoppingTypes

      public static final StringParameterKey CloningLocalContactTraversalStoppingTypes
      When a locally stored contact is cloned for use on another Claim (e.g. as the Payee of a transferred Check or Recovery), stop following FK links in the entity graph where these entity types are encountered. Claim and User types are always included in this list, even if removed from the config parameter value.

    • DataDestructionMaxWaitForBlockingMessagesToFinish

      public static final IntegerParameterKey DataDestructionMaxWaitForBlockingMessagesToFinish
      Specifies the maximum number of seconds to wait on queued messages that block a personal data destruction request. It will retry once a second until either the messages are processed or time runs out, so 60 (the default) will perform up to 60 retries over 1 minute, while 0 will proceed immediately without checking the queues.

    • InstantPaymentIntegrationEnabled

      public static final BooleanParameterKey InstantPaymentIntegrationEnabled
      Flag for enabling Instant Payment Integration feature.

    • EventMigratableWorkItemPriorityForOpenClaims

      public static final IntegerParameterKey EventMigratableWorkItemPriorityForOpenClaims
      The value used to calculate the priority of a work item with open Claims in CCEventMigratabalePriorityPlugin.

    • EventMigratableWorkItemPriorityForUpdatedClaims

      public static final IntegerParameterKey EventMigratableWorkItemPriorityForUpdatedClaims
      The value used to calculate the priority of a work item with recently updated Claims in CCEventMigratabalePriorityPlugin.

    • PaymentRecodeValidationExtensionFields

      public static final ListParameterKey PaymentRecodeValidationExtensionFields
      The list of extension fields on Payment or TransactionLineItem for payment recode validation whose modification will allow a payment recode. Example list: Payment.MyPmtField_Ext, TransactionLineItem.TLIField_Ext

    • RecoveryRecodeValidationExtensionFields

      public static final ListParameterKey RecoveryRecodeValidationExtensionFields
      The list of extension fields on Recovery or TransactionLineItem for recovery recode validation whose modification will allow a recovery recode. Example list: Recovery.MyRecoveryField_Ext, TransactionLineItem.TLIField_Ext

    • RequireExposuresToBeNewLossWhenSubmittingWithCloudAPI

      public static final BooleanParameterKey RequireExposuresToBeNewLossWhenSubmittingWithCloudAPI
      When enabled, exposures must reach the validation level "newloss" when their claim is submitted in the Cloud API. When disabled, they need only reach "loadsave". Enabled maintains the base configuration behavior of Aspen to Jasper. Disabled matches the base configuration behavior of the New Claim Wizard. Disabled by default

    • EnableWorkersCompMainInjuryIncidentInCloudAPI

      public static final BooleanParameterKey EnableWorkersCompMainInjuryIncidentInCloudAPI
      When enabled, allows access to the "mainWorkersCompInjuryIncident" property on the InjuryIncident schema, requires that workers' comp claims be submitted in composite with their "main" injury incident, and includes the "main" injury incident in the injury incidents collection endpoint. Disable to retain behavior from Jasper and prior. Enabled by default

    • GiveInternalUsersFullPermissionsInCommonActivitiesApi

      public static final BooleanParameterKey GiveInternalUsersFullPermissionsInCommonActivitiesApi
      When enabled, allows internal users to retrieve all the activities they have permissions for in the /common/v1/activities API. When false, internal users will only be able to see the activities that are explicitly assigned to them.

    • GiveProducerAccessToAllExposures

      public static final BooleanParameterKey GiveProducerAccessToAllExposures
      When true, gives producers access to all exposures on viewable claims. When false, producers can only access exposures where the claimant has a producer accessible role. Disable to retain behavior from Kufri and prior. Enabled by default.

  • Constructor Details

    • CCConfigParameters

      public CCConfigParameters()

  • Method Details

    • getAllKeys

      public static Map<String,ParameterKey> getAllKeys()
      Returns:
      a map of all parameters keys defined in the product. Platform config keys should be fetched using PLConfigParameters.getAllKeys()
